e:AD-2.21.e:Title: NOISE ABATEMENT PROVISIONS
e:AD-2.21.x:p: Motor planes shall not overfly the town area.

e:AD-2.22.e:Title: FLIGHT PROCEDURE
e:AD-2.22.x:p: Motor planes shall fly left hand traffic pattern in case of 360° landing direction and right hand pattern in case of 180° landing direction.
